attributes.action: re-introduce the 10p Basic Rate of Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The abolition of the 10p tax rate has thrown a significant number of people into a worse financial position, right at the time when borrowing costs are spiralling and the cost of living generally is out-pacing small or non-existant income increases.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
